kw.doc: Splits `/w/e2e_tests/002_unit_tests.robot` into path and filename. Constructs a path to the coverage file in `/w/e2e_tests/results`. Returns the coverage full file path and the coverage filename separately.

kw.name: Split Path
kw.doc: Splits the given path from the last path separator (``/`` or ``\``).

kw.name: Split Extension
kw.doc: Splits the extension from the given path.

kw.name: Join Path
kw.doc: Joins the given path part(s) to the given base path.

kw.doc: Runs a process and waits for it to complete.

kw.doc: Logs the given messages as separate entries using the INFO level.

suite.doc: Run native unit tests for the golang code and serves to aggregate all test results into one report, also generating a coverage report.

suite.doc: A series of test cases designed to verify the behavior of various configurations, ranging from valid to invalid scenarios. It utilizes keywords and resources defined in the 'resources/keywords.robot' file for test execution.

test.doc: Combine all code coverage profiles into one.

suite.doc: Aggregate multiple code coverage reports into a single report. It leverages the gocovmerge utility, a Go tool that merges multiple coverage profiles. The suite utilizes keywords defined in the resources/keywords.robot file.
